A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: * UPDATED: After seeing it again I liked it better and have it one more star. *ORIGINAL: Not what I hoped for and definitely not what I expected. I left the theater thinking I missed something and saying to myself maybe I need to see it again because I had an empty unfulfilled feeling. BTW NO ONE clapped at the end of the movie. That has never happened at any Star Wars film I’ve seen on opening night.
